ui.home.png: Home button icon used to navigate back to the main menu.
ui.back.png: Back arrow icon used to go back to previous screens.
ui.story.png: Open book icon representing the Stories section.
ui.songs.png: Musical note icon representing the Songs section.
ui.games.png: Puzzle piece icon representing the Games section.
ui.instruments.png: Keyboard icon representing the Instruments section.
ui.sounds.png: Headphones icon representing the Sounds section.
ui.crown.png: Crown icon used in the progress UI.
ui.star.png: Star icon used for rewards and achievements.
ui.settings.png: Gear icon used to access the settings or parents gate.
ui.menu.png: Hamburger menu icon used for secondary menus.

progress.crown.png: Base crown image where gems or rewards are placed.
progress.star.png: Gold star used to indicate a completed activity or reward.
progress.medal.png: Medal icon used for special achievements or high scores.

categories.farm.png: Icon representing the farm animals category (a stylised cow silhouette on a pastel background)
categories.wild.png: Icon representing the wild animals category (a bear-like head with ears)
categories.sea.png: Icon representing the sea animals category (a fish with a triangle tail)
categories.vehicles.png: Icon representing the vehicles category (a small car with wheels and roof)
categories.house.png: Icon representing the house sounds category (a house with door and roof)
categories.nature.png: Icon representing the nature category (a tree with trunk and foliage)
categories.ambient.png: Icon representing the ambient category (a swirling star)

extra_backgrounds.farmland.png: Additional background depicting farmland with green fields and blue sky gradient
extra_backgrounds.forest.png: Background showing a dense forest scene with dark and light greens
extra_backgrounds.sea.png: Calming ocean background with deep blue to light blue gradient
extra_backgrounds.desert.png: Warm desert background transitioning from sand to golden hues

backgrounds.day.png: Main menu background depicting a bright day with a blue sky.
backgrounds.sunset.png: Background showing a warm sunset atmosphere.
backgrounds.night.png: Background representing a calm night scene with stars.
backgrounds.winter.png: Snowy winter background used during carol or winter scenes.

memory.apple.png: Memory card image depicting a red apple.
memory.tree.png: Memory card image depicting a green tree.
memory.sun.png: Memory card image depicting a yellow sun.
memory.moon.png: Memory card image depicting a crescent moon.
memory.flower.png: Memory card image depicting a colorful flower.
memory.fish.png: Memory card image depicting a blue fish.

colored.circle.png: Colorful circle shape used for matching and shape games.
colored.square.png: Colorful square shape used for matching and shape games.
colored.triangle.png: Colorful triangle shape used for matching and shape games.

silhouettes.circle.png: Black silhouette of a circle used in shadow matching games.
silhouettes.square.png: Black silhouette of a square used in shadow matching games.
silhouettes.triangle.png: Black silhouette of a triangle used in shadow matching games.
